xwikidoc.name: ProjectsDevSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}} #if($request.tab=="dev" || $context.action=="edit") (% id="pTabDev" class="xform" %) ((( ; <label for="ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass_0_issueApplicationURL">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('issueApplicationURL', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('issueApplicationURL') ; <label for="ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass_0_versionControlURL">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('versionControlURL', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('versionControlURL') ; <label for="ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass_0_productVersion">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('productVersion', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('productVersion') #if ($context.display == 'edit') ; <label for="ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass_0_productCustomizations">$doc.display('productCustomizations')$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('productCustomizations', false, false))</label> #else ; <label for="ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass_0_productCustomizations">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('productCustomizations', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('productCustomizations') #end ; <label for="ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass_0_productBranch">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('productBranch', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('productBranch') ; <label for="ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass_0_productVersionControlURLs">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('productVersionControlURLs', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('productVersionControlURLs') ; <label for="ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass_0_productIssues">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('productIssues', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('productIssues') ; <label for="ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass_0_productCustomizationIssues">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('productCustomizationIssues', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('productCustomizationIssues') ; <label for="ProjectsCode.ProjectsCodeClass_0_productWorkedaroundIssues">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('productWorkedaroundIssues', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('productWorkedaroundIssues')
#if($context.action == 'view') #set($configDoc = $xwiki.getDocument("ProjectsCode.ProjectConfig")) #set($taskTool = $configDoc.getValue("taskTool")) {{include document="${taskTool}" /}} #end #end {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
